item.title: 早间竞标：美联储在最后一次减息竞赛中领先
item.description: 凯文-巴克兰对欧洲和全球市场未来一天的展望【原文：A look at the day ahead in European and global markets from Kevin Buckland】

item.title: 优步和 Lyft 推迟撤离明尼阿波利斯的计划
item.description: 乘车服务公司 Lyft 和 Uber 周四表示，它们将把在明尼阿波利斯的服务延长至 7 月 1 日，一天前市政府官员投票决定将司机加薪的起始日期推迟两个月。【原文：Ride-hailing companies Lyft and Uber will extend their services in Minneapolis till July 1, they said on Thursday, after city officials voted a day earlier to push back the start of a driver pay raise by two months.】

item.title: 市场权衡美联储减息时机，股市低迷，黄金再创新高
item.description: 周五，亚洲股市气氛低迷，投资者在美国通胀前景不明朗的情况下思考美联储的降息路径。【原文：Asian equities were in a subdued mood on Friday as investors pondered the path for Federal Reserve interest rate cuts amid a murky U.S. inflation outlook.】

item.title: 巴西法官因利益冲突暂停巴西国家石油公司主席职务
item.description: 路透社周四看到的一份法院判决书显示，巴西一名法官已将巴西国家石油公司（Petrobras）董事会主席彼得罗-桑帕约-门德斯（Pietro Sampaio Mendes）停职，原因是他在能源部的角色存在利益冲突。【原文：A Brazilian judge has suspended the chair of state oil firm Petrobras' board, Pietro Sampaio Mendes, over a conflict of interest regarding his role in the Ministry of Energy, according to a court decision seen by Reuters on Thursday.】

item.title: 据国家媒体报道，中国光大集团前董事长被控受贿
item.description: 据中国国家媒体周五报道，中国光大集团前董事长唐双宁被控受贿和腐败。【原文：Former China Everbright Group Chairman Tang Shuangning has been charged with taking bribes and corruption, Chinese state media reported on Friday.】

item.title: 美国参议院委员会就波音安全文化报告举行听证会
item.description: 美国参议院商务委员会周四表示，将于下周举行一次听证会，听取专家小组成员的意见。该专家小组于今年 2 月发布了一份报告，批评了波音公司的安全文化，并呼吁对其进行重大改进。【原文：The U.S. Senate Commerce Committee said on Thursday it would hold a hearing next week with members of an expert panel that released a report in February criticizing Boeing's safety culture and calling for significant improvements.】

item.title: 日元在美元和美国国债收益率高企的影响下崩溃
item.description: 日元上周五难以摆脱34年来的低点，并将出现周线下跌，而美元则与美国国债收益率一起徘徊在五个月高点附近，因为交易商大幅缩减了对美国今年一系列降息的押注。【原文：The yen struggled to break away from a 34-year low on Friday and was headed for a weekly decline, while the dollar hovered near a five-month high alongside U.S. Treasury yields as traders heavily scaled back bets for a slew of U.S. rate cuts this year.】

item.title: 中东局势令油价回升
item.description: 周五早盘，油价上涨，原因是中东紧张局势加剧，伊朗承诺对以色列疑似空袭其驻叙利亚使馆进行报复，这可能导致产油区的供应面临中断风险。【原文：Oil prices rose in early trade on Friday on heightened tensions in the Middle East, where Iran has promised to retaliate for a suspected Israeli air strike on its embassy in Syria, which could risk disruptions to supply from the oil producing region.】

item.title: 日本再次警告日元过度疲软
item.description: 日本财务大臣铃木俊一表示，当局正在分析的不仅是近期日元的跌势，还有推动日元走势的因素，并重申东京随时准备应对任何过度的货币波动。【原文：Japanese Finance Minister Shunichi Suzuki said authorities were analysing not just recent yen declines but factors that are driving the moves, and repeated that Tokyo stood ready to respond to any excessive currency swings.】

item.title: 聚焦：越南电动汽车制造商 VinFast 面临的挑战加剧了母公司 Vingroup 的风险
item.description: 越南最大的企业集团 Vingroup 在雄心勃勃的全球扩张计划中加倍努力发展电动汽车业务的同时，也面临着亏损部门 VinFast Auto 带来的越来越大的财务风险。【原文：As Vietnam's biggest conglomerate Vingroup doubles down on its electric vehicle business with ambitious global expansion plans, it faces growing financial risks stemming from loss-making unit VinFast Auto .】

item.title: 洛克希德公司赢得美国政府价值 41 亿美元的作战指挥系统合同
item.description: 洛克希德-马丁公司（Lockheed Martin）周四表示，该公司已赢得美国政府导弹防御局价值高达 41 亿美元的合同，将继续开发其作战指挥系统。【原文：Lockheed Martin said on Thursday it had won a contract worth up to $4.1 billion from the U.S. government's Missile Defense Agency to continue the development of its battle command system.】

item.title: Rho Motion 称，3 月份全球电动汽车销量增长 12%，欧洲下降 9
item.description: 市场研究公司Rho Motion周五表示，3月份全球全电动汽车和插电式混合动力汽车（PHEV）的销量与2023年同期相比增长了12%，其中中国和美国市场的增长被欧洲市场9%的跌幅部分抵消。【原文：Global sales of fully electric and plug-in hybrid vehicles (PHEVs) rose 12% in March versus the same month in 2023, with growth in China and the U.S. market partly offset by a 9% drop in Europe, market research firm Rho Motion said on Friday.】

item.title: 派拉蒙股东对 Skydance Media 可能合并的呼声越来越高
item.description: 派拉蒙全球公司的一些投资者就与 Skydance Media 合并的可能性发表了意见，呼吁这家美国媒体集团考虑其他选择，并在交易达成后公平对待股东。【原文：Some Paramount Global investors are speaking out about a possible merger with Skydance Media, calling on the U.S. media conglomerate to look at other options and to treat shareholders equitably if this deal should be inked.】

item.title: 早间竞价外汇担忧加剧，韩国设定利率
item.description: 亚洲市场前瞻【原文：A look at the day ahead in Asian markets.】

item.title: 独家报道消息人士称，西南航空预计 2024 年波音飞机交付量将继续缩减
item.description: 三位熟知内情的人士表示，西南航空公司预计波音公司今年的飞机交付量仅为该公司 46 年 3 月预计的一半左右，这将给这家美国廉价航空公司的增长计划带来进一步的压力。【原文：Southwest Airlines expects aircraft deliveries from Boeing this year to come in at only about half of the airline's estimate in March of 46, putting further pressure on the U.S. budget carrier's growth plans, three people familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 派拉蒙计划在 Skydance 交易谈判中将董事会缩减至七名董事
item.description: 派拉蒙全球公司（Paramount Global）周四披露，该公司计划将董事会董事人数从目前的 11 人减至 7 人，因为有报道称，这家由莎莉-雷德斯通（Shari Redstone）控制的娱乐巨头正在讨论与 Skydance Media 合并的事宜。【原文：Paramount Global disclosed on Thursday that it plans to reduce its board to seven directors from 11 currently amid reports that the entertainment giant controlled by Shari Redstone was discussing a merger with Skydance Media.】

item.title: ADM部门扩大召回范围，纳入更多动物饲料产品
item.description: Archer-Daniels-Midland公司周四表示，由于镁、钠、钙和/或磷含量升高可能对动物造成伤害，该公司正在扩大召回范围，将另外17个批次的鸡、猪和兔饲料产品纳入召回范围。【原文：Archer-Daniels-Midland said on Thursday its division is expanding a recall to include 17 additional lots of chicken, swine and rabbit feed products due to elevated levels of magnesium, sodium, calcium and/or phosphorus that may harm the animals.】

item.title: 俄亥俄州参议员希望拜登永久禁止中国电动汽车进入美国
item.description: 参议院银行委员会主席周四敦促乔-拜登总统阻止中国制造的汽车进入美国汽车市场。【原文：The chair of the Senate Banking Committee on Thursday urged President Joe Biden to block Chinese-made vehicles from the United States auto market.】

item.title: 美国季度财报将以科技相关公司的大幅增长为特点
item.description: 在即将到来的美国报告期，大型科技相关公司的盈利预计将再次引领 S&P 500 指数的利润增长，这可能会在 4 月份的疲软开局之后为股市的乐观情绪注入新的活力。【原文：Big technology-related company earnings are expected to again lead S&P 500 profit growth in the upcoming U.S. reporting period, which could refuel optimism for stocks after a weak start to April.】

item.title: 通胀升温或令美联储在大选季降息
item.description: 火热的美国通胀数据使美联储关于首次降息的辩论有可能与总统大选日程相撞，尽管一众关注美联储的顶级经济学家也预测，美联储在美国人投票之前不会采取行动。【原文：Hot U.S. inflation data has put the Federal Reserve's debate over a first interest rate cut on a potential collision course with the presidential election calendar, although a parade of top-level Fed-watching economists also predict the Fed won't make its move until after Americans go to the polls.】

item.title: 美国网络机构称俄罗斯黑客利用微软权限窃取政府电子邮件
item.description: 美国网络安全和基础设施安全局（U.S. Cybersecurity and Infrastructure Security Agency）周四发布的一份紧急指令显示，俄罗斯政府支持的黑客利用他们对微软电子邮件系统的访问权限，窃取了官员与这家科技巨头之间的通信。【原文：The U.S. Cybersecurity and Infrastructure Security Agency said Russian government-backed hackers have used their access to Microsoft's email system to steal correspondence between officials and the tech giant, an emergency directive by the U.S. watchdog released on Thursday showed.】

item.title: 据英国《金融时报》报道，泰勒-斯威夫特（Taylor Swift）尽管与环球音乐公司（Universal Music）发生争执，但其音乐仍重返 TikTok 平台
item.description: 据英国《金融时报》周四报道，泰勒-斯威夫特（Taylor Swift）的音乐重新回到了 TikTok 上，尽管这款中国短视频应用与歌手的唱片公司环球音乐（Universal Music）正处于对立状态。【原文：Taylor Swift's music is back on TikTok, even as the Chinese short-video app and singer's record label Universal Music are at loggerheads, the Financial Times reported on Thursday.】

item.title: 欧洲央行不能无视美联储的降息之路
item.description: 欧洲央行可能会抗议自己并不 "依赖美联储"，但它很可能会发现，不管自己愿不愿意，自己唱的都是主要由美国联邦储备局谱写的赞美诗。【原文：The European Central Bank may protest it is not "Fed-dependent" but it will likely find itself singing from a hymn sheet largely written by the U.S. Federal Reserve whether it wants to or not.】

item.title: 班克曼-弗里德就 FTX 欺诈定罪和 25 年刑期提出上诉
item.description: 山姆-班克曼-弗里德（Sam Bankman-Fried）因从他创办的现已破产的 FTX 加密货币交易所的客户那里窃取 80 亿美元而被定罪并被判处 25 年监禁，他面临着成年后大部分时间都要在牢狱中度过的前景，周四，他对自己的定罪和 25 年监禁判决提出了上诉。【原文：Sam Bankman-Fried, facing the prospect of spending much of his adult life behind bars, on Thursday appealed his conviction and 25-year prison sentence for stealing $8 billion from customers of the now-bankrupt FTX cryptocurrency exchange he founded.】

item.title: 全球首席执行官调整后，波音公司专注于在拉丁美洲 "建立信任
item.description: 波音公司拉丁美洲总裁兰登-卢米斯（Landon Loomis）表示，在一系列安全事故动摇了人们对公司的信任并导致首席执行官戴夫-卡尔霍恩（Dave Calhoun）宣布将在年底前下台之后，这家陷入困境的飞机制造商正在集中精力重建信任。【原文：Boeing's Latin America President Landon Loomis says that the embattled airplane manufacturer is focusing on rebuilding trust after a series of safety incidents have shaken trust in the company and led CEO Dave Calhoun to announce he would step down by year-end.】

item.title: 据《华尔街日报》报道，摩根士丹利的财富管理部门正接受多家监管机构的调查
item.description: 据《华尔街日报》周四援引知情人士的话报道，摩根士丹利的财富管理部门正在接受多个监管机构的调查。【原文：Morgan Stanley's wealth management arm is being probed by multiple regulators, the Wall Street Journal reported on Thursday citing people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 欧盟将于 5 月 17 日前就新日铁对美国钢铁公司的竞购做出决定，批准只是走过场
item.description: 欧盟委员会的一份文件显示，新日铁以 149 亿美元收购美国钢铁公司的交易将于 5 月 17 日前由欧盟反垄断监管机构做出决定，其批准将流于形式。【原文：Nippon Steel's $14.9 billion acquisition of U.S. Steel Corp will be decided by European Union antitrust regulators by May 17, with their approval a formality, a European Commission filing showed.】

item.title: 独家报道消息人士称，阿联酋 ADNOC 最近将英国石油公司视为收购目标
item.description: 熟悉内情的人士告诉路透社，阿拉伯联合酋长国的国有石油公司最近考虑收购英国的英国石油公司（BP），但讨论没有超出初步讨论的范围。【原文：The United Arab Emirates' state-owned oil company recently considered buying Britain's BP but the deliberations did not progress beyond preliminary discussions, people familiar with the matter told Reuters.】

item.title: 福特下调 F-150 Lightning XLT、Flash 和 Lariat 车型的价格
item.description: 底特律汽车制造商福特汽车公司周四表示，随着该公司在竞争激烈的电动汽车市场上不断摸索，其F-150 "闪电 "电动皮卡的部分车型降价多达5500美元。【原文：Ford Motor cut prices of some variants of its F-150 Lightning electric pickup truck by as much as $5,500, the Detroit automaker said on Thursday, as it navigates a competitive EV market.】

item.title: 彭博新闻社报道：苹果为 Mac 准备 M4 芯片
item.description: 据彭博新闻社周四援引知情人士的话报道，苹果公司即将生产下一代 M4 电脑处理器，并计划用它更新每款 Mac 机型。【原文：Apple is nearing the production of next generation M4 computer processors and plans to update every Mac model with it, Bloomberg News reported on Thursday, citing people with knowledge of the matter.】
